reviewtext: I bought the Recoton SVS1000 after getting a second VCR, and a DVD player, for my TV.  This despite the fact that my TV had three video inputs to begin with.  These days a couple of inputs isn't enough.  Especially when you count video game systems, and camcorders.  Getting this saved me from having to swap cables all the time, which is what I was duing until I got it.  It's simple to use, just plug and click.  It's a great time saver.
